Class MongoRotationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.adorsys.keymanagement.keyrotation.mongo.MongoRotationManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyStorePersistence, RotationLocker

extends Object
implements KeyStorePersistence, RotationLocker

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      MongoRotationManager(String keyStoreId, net.javacrumbs.shedlock.core.LockProvider lockProvider, com.mongodb.MongoClient client, String databaseName, String keyStoreCollectionName, net.javacrumbs.shedlock.core.LockingTaskExecutor executor, Duration lockAtMost) 
      MongoRotationManager(String keyStoreId, com.mongodb.MongoClient client, net.javacrumbs.shedlock.core.LockProvider lockProvider, String databaseName, String keyStoreCollectionName, Duration lockAtMost)
      KeyStore persistence happens in Mongo, but locking is provided by other provider (other RDBMS/database, Redis,...)
      MongoRotationManager(String keyStoreId, com.mongodb.MongoClient client, String databaseName, String lockCollectionName, String keyStoreCollectionName, Duration lockAtMost)
      KeyStore persistence and rotation locking belong to same Database.
